name: Long cold dark
description:
Chris crashes his car in the middle of the night and must navigate through the dark forest to get help. Uncover his mysterious past along the way in this story driven, visual horror adventure. 

Controls: Access different interactions by clicking the left mouse button. Items will be added to the inventory menu in the upper corner of the screen. The pause menu is located in the lower left corner of the screen. 

We are having som problems with the save, load and options functions so try to avoid using them. The game autosaves at certain points however so dont worry.
